name: nearest-road
summary: Find nearest point on road network
description:
The nearest-road command finds the closest point on the road network to a given coordinate. Useful for:

- Map matching (snapping GPS points to roads)
- Finding road access points
- Route planning preparation
- Address geocoding verification

Returns the snapped point, distance, and road information.

options.-m, --mode: Travel mode: walk, bike, drive, all (default: all)
options.-f, --format: Output format: text, geojson, json (default: text)

output:
Nearest road point with:
- Snapped coordinates
- Distance from input point (meters)
- Road name and type
- Way ID

GeoJSON includes input point, snapped point, connection line, and road segment.
